TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MMC_TASK extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Especifica todos os dados necessários para configurar uma tarefa individual em um bloco de tarefas.

span.span: Specifies all the data that is required to set up an individual task on a task pad.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obter mais informações sobre a programação com o MMC\_estrutura de tarefa e o Microsoft Management Console (MMC), consulte o [guia do programador do MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the MMC\_TASK structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
